33.eng-name: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to (put) bend his head (out) to me while he was in I`tikaf in the mosque during my monthly periods and I would comb and oil his hair

chapter.eng-name: A menstruating woman is permitted to comb the hair of a man in I'tikaf.
